data.comment: The big names in today's match at Johan Cruijff Arena have now been confirmed.
Amsterdam kick-off the first half - the match is underway!
Amsterdam awarded a throw-in in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Can Amsterdam get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Alkmaar's half?
In Amsterdam, Amsterdam push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Throw-in for Amsterdam in the half of Alkmaar.
Myron Boadu puts the ball in the net and the away team now lead 0-1.
Fredrik Midtsjo instrumental with a fine assist.
Can Amsterdam capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Alkmaar's half?
Throw-in for Alkmaar in their own half.
Corner awarded to Amsterdam.
Ball safe as Amsterdam is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Amsterdam awarded a free kick in their own half.
Serdar Gozubuyuk signals a Amsterdam throw-in in Alkmaar's half.
In Amsterdam, Hakim Ziyech of Amsterdam is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Serdar Gozubuyuk awards the away team a throw-in.
Amsterdam have a goal kick.
Serdar Gozubuyuk signals a free kick to Amsterdam in their own half.
Amsterdam have been awarded a corner by Serdar Gozubuyuk.
Amsterdam surge into the attack at Johan Cruijff Arena but Nicolas Tagliaficoâ€™s header is off-target.
Serdar Gozubuyuk awards Alkmaar a goal kick.
Oussama Idrissi for Alkmaar is whistled offside.
Free kick for Alkmaar in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Amsterdam.
Fredrik Midtsjo gets his shot on target but fails to score for Alkmaar.
Alkmaar have been awarded a corner by Serdar Gozubuyuk.
Alkmaar to take a throw-in in Amsterdam territory.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Amsterdam's Quincy Promes is back in action after a slight knock.
Serdar Gozubuyuk waits before resuming play because Quincy Promes for Amsterdam is still down.
Alkmaar awarded a free kick in their own half.
Amsterdam pushes forward through Lisandro Martinez, whose finish on goal is saved.
Goal kick for Amsterdam at Johan Cruijff Arena.
Dusan Tadic (Amsterdam) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Ball goes out of play for a Alkmaar goal kick.
Corner awarded to Amsterdam.
Lisandro Martinez of Amsterdam gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Alkmaar at Johan Cruijff Arena.
Throw-in Alkmaar.
Alkmaar will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Amsterdam.
Throw-in for Alkmaar close to the penalty box.
Alkmaar's Dani De Wit gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Amsterdam.
Serdar Gozubuyuk signals a Alkmaar throw-in in Amsterdam's half.
Carel Eiting for Amsterdam gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Alkmaar goal kick.
Serdar Gozubuyuk signals a throw-in for Amsterdam, close to Alkmaar's area.
Free kick in a good position for Amsterdam!
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Calvin Stengs.
Throw-in for Alkmaar at Johan Cruijff Arena.
Can Amsterdam get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Alkmaar's half?
Alkmaar drives forward and Myron Boadu gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
1 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Amsterdam.
Alkmaar have a goal kick.
Throw-in Amsterdam.
The first-half is over.
The ref has blown to start the second-half. Alkmaar kick-off.
Alkmaar to take a throw-in in Amsterdam territory.
Amsterdam have a dangerous throw-in.
Ball safe as Alkmaar is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Amsterdam's Carel Eiting is on target but unsuccessful.
Amsterdam's Daley Blind gets in a shot on goal at Johan Cruijff Arena. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Amsterdam have been awarded a corner by Serdar Gozubuyuk.
Amsterdam's Daley Blind gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Alkmaar defender.
Amsterdam are pushing forward but Perr Schuurs's finish is wide of the goal.
Serdar Gozubuyuk awards Alkmaar a goal kick.
Throw-in for Amsterdam in their own half.
Calvin Stengs has recovered and rejoins the match in Amsterdam.
In Amsterdam Amsterdam attack through Dusan Tadic. The finish is off target, however.
Alkmaar have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Amsterdam at Johan Cruijff Arena.
Serdar Gozubuyuk signals a free kick to Alkmaar in their own half.
Oussama Idrissi of Alkmaar smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Amsterdam awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Alkmaar in the half of Amsterdam.
Amsterdam needs to be cautious. Alkmaar have an attacking throw-in.
Serdar Gozubuyuk awards the home team a throw-in.
Alkmaar are coming forward and Calvin Stengs gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Amsterdam goal kick.
Throw-in Alkmaar.
Amsterdam are in shooting range from this free kick.
Serdar Gozubuyuk awards Alkmaar a goal kick.
Free kick for Alkmaar in their own half.
Goal kick for Amsterdam at Johan Cruijff Arena.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Amsterdam.
Alkmaar's Calvin Stengs misses with an attempt on goal.
Amsterdam awarded a free kick in their own half.
Owen Wijndal (Alkmaar) gets a yellow card. He will be suspended from the next match!
Amsterdam's Hakim Ziyech breaks free at Johan Cruijff Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Alkmaar have a goal kick.
Alkmaar's Myron Boadu misses with an attempt on goal.
Serdar Gozubuyuk awards Amsterdam a goal kick.
Daley Blind for Amsterdam drives towards goal at Johan Cruijff Arena. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Serdar Gozubuyuk signals a Amsterdam throw-in in Alkmaar's half.
Can Amsterdam get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Alkmaar's half?
Amsterdam's Donny van de Beek is on target but unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Amsterdam.
Nicolas Tagliafico (Amsterdam) strikes at Johan Cruijff Arena but his header is cleared.
Corner awarded to Amsterdam.
In Amsterdam, Nicolas Tagliafico (Amsterdam) misses the target with a header.
Goal kick for Alkmaar at Johan Cruijff Arena.
Goal! Oussama Idrissi extends Alkmaar's lead to 0-2.
Teun Koopmeiners with an assist there.
Corner awarded to Amsterdam.
Amsterdam have been awarded a corner by Serdar Gozubuyuk.
In Amsterdam Amsterdam attack through Quincy Promes. The finish is off target, however.
Ramon Leeuwin (Alkmaar) has received a yellow card from Serdar Gozubuyuk.
Amsterdam have been awarded a corner by Serdar Gozubuyuk.
Klaas-Jan Huntelaar is replacing Hakim Ziyech for Amsterdam at Johan Cruijff Arena.
Alkmaar make their first substitution with Thomas Ouwejan replacing Oussama Idrissi.
Serdar Gozubuyuk signals a free kick to Amsterdam in their own half.
Serdar Gozubuyuk awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick for Amsterdam in their own half.
Ball safe as Alkmaar is awarded a throw-in in their half.
[47] ([48]) gets in a header on goal but the attempt is cleared.
Alkmaar to take a throw-in in Amsterdam territory.
Amsterdam awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Amsterdam in the half of Alkmaar.
3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Amsterdam pushes forward through Lisandro Martinez, whose finish on goal is saved.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
[36] is back on his feet again.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Amsterdam close to the penalty box.
Throw-in for Alkmaar at Johan Cruijff Arena.
Serdar Gozubuyuk blows to end the match. The final score is 0-2.
Ferdy Druijf is on a sub for Myron Boadu for Alkmaar.
[36] is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
The away team replace Fredrik Midtsjo with Yukinari Sugawara.
